name: Sporous Crab
description: The Sporous Crab is a small, filthy beast found in swamps and dank caves, with natural armor and a rough exterior covered in grime.
memorable: Its ability to infect creatures with spores makes it a dangerous foe in creature encounters.
goals: Typically seeks to ambush unsuspecting prey and establish its dominance in murky waters.
relations: Generally solitary but may coexist with other filthy swamp creatures.
environment: Swamps or dank caves, thriving in filthy environments.
strengths: Resistance to bludgeoning damage and ability to inflict poison.
attacks: Can deliver two claw attacks that deal bludgeoning damage, and it can unleash a spore spray that infects and damages foes.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Spore' action can infect creatures and eventually hatch young Sporous Crabs from them if not treated.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light.
additional_information: Infection can lead to sewer plague if saving throws are failed.
Tap into amphibious nature for versatile combat strategies.
Intentionally lurks in muddy areas to ambush prey.
Can be countered with spells like lesser restoration.
Has a passive Perception score of 11.
test_queries: small filthy creature with spore attack
